introduction: Apari and Dimitri discuss the evaluation space in LLMs, specifically focusing on evaluating the whole LLM system. Apari, Chief Product Officer at Arise AI, shares her insights on evaluating LLMs as a judge and the importance of finetuning traditional ML. The conversation also touches on the challenges of traditional ML engineers jumping to finetuning. The episode also covers the Arise AI open source package, Phoenix, for LLM evaluation and observability.

sections.title: Section 1: Introduction
content: Apari and Dimitri introduce themselves and the topic of the episode: evaluating LLMs and LLM systems.
Apari shares her background in the observability space and her work at Arise AI.
They discuss the challenges of evaluating LLMs and the importance of creating a useful product.
Apari highlights the role of LLMs as a judge in the evaluation process.

sections.title: Section 2: LLM Evaluation
content: Apari explains the importance of evaluating LLMs not only for the output but also the retrieval process.
They discuss the challenges of evaluating LLMs and the need for a comprehensive approach.
Apari shares her insights on using LLMs as a judge in the evaluation process.
They discuss the importance of finetuning LLMs for better performance.

sections.title: Section 3: Traditional ML Engineers and Finetuning
content: Apari discusses the challenges of traditional ML engineers jumping to finetuning.
They explore the differences between traditional ML and LLM and how they can be applied to different tasks.
Apari shares her insights on the importance of understanding the strengths and weaknesses of LLMs.
They discuss the role of LLMs in solving complex problems.

sections.title: Section 4: Arise AI and Phoenix
content: Apari introduces the Arise AI open source package, Phoenix, for LLM evaluation and observability.
They discuss the importance of open source in the LLM community.
Apari shares her insights on the development of Phoenix and its role in LLM evaluation.
They explore the challenges and opportunities of working with open source in LLM.

sections.title: Section 5: Conclusion
content: Apari and Dimitri summarize the main points of the episode and the importance of LLM evaluation and observability.
They discuss the future of LLMs and the need for continued research and development.
Apari shares her insights on the role of LLMs in shaping the future of AI.
They conclude the episode with a call to action for the LLM community to continue pushing the boundaries of LLM technology.
